name: Tri-Sight -Team Wheelas
description: Inside you will find the build and the HOW TO PLAY PDF. Tri-Sight is a 3player co-op game that you play over the internet! Create your own lobby and choose between 3 roles. In a world where coming together is more crucial than ever, we need to listen to each other and understand that our individual perspectives when combined create a greater whole. In Trisight 3 players have 3 different abilities but also 3 glaring weaknesses. You will need to talk to each other and guide one another, listen and co-operate in order to escape the Labryinth.
